mapper.select: SELECT a.*, sd.value as status_value, sd.remark as status_color, p.title as payment_name, u.nickname as user_name FROM t_user_withdraw a LEFT JOIN shop_payment p ON (a.payment_id=p.id) LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON (a.user_id=u.userId) left join `sys_dict` sd on(a.status=sd.code and sd.type='user_withdraw_status') WHERE a.id=#{id}
